list-item.p: Group I: normal control treated with distilled water (D.W.) (0.2 mL/day).
Group II: diabetic control treated with D.W. (0.2 mL/day).
Group III: diabetic mice treated with glibenclamide (2 mg/kg/day b.w.).
Group IV: diabetic mice treated with WFLE (200 mg/kg/day b.w.).
Group V: diabetic mice treated with WFLE (400 mg/kg/day b.w.).
